title.rendered: HOTTEST NEW DESIGNER BAG TRENDS FOR FALL

content.rendered:
The new must-have bags for fall and winter are here. I think bag designs just keep getting better and better and so hard to choose which one to invest in. I personally love Gucci, YSL, Stella McCartney, and so many others.

In this blog post, I’m featuring some of the hottest designer bags that all the fashion influencers are rocking on Instagram.

How beautiful is the new black Valentino bag with large gold studs as well as the white Valentino bag with an oversized gold logo. 

Moving on we throw it back to the 1990s and early ’00 with the new black and white Balenciaga bag. The design altho updated and new reminds me of that time period when that similar design became popular.

I also love the two-tone YSL mini bag and the fun reedition polkadot Prada bag. And the new Stella McCartney chain bag is to die for.

Which one do you have your eye on to add to your collection?

Love, Dionne
